archdesc.scopecontent: Architectural model of the Ann and Robert H. Lurie Tower (the Lurie Tower), a 1996 memorial for the University of Michigan alumnus Robert H. Lurie, located on the North Campus in Ann Arbor. The Lurie Tower was designed by the University of Michigan alumnus Charles Moore (October 31, 1925-December 16, 1993; University of Michigan Class of 1947, Hon. Arch. Ph.D., 1992), with the structural engineering done by Robert M. Darvas Associates.
